attributes.action: urge the Northamptonshire Primary Care Trust to preserve respite care services for chronic disabled people at their Favell House care facility.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Northamptonshire Care Trust is undertaking a 'service review' where they are considering the cessation of specialist disabled respite care services at Favell House Northampton.

This unit has only recently undergone massive refurbishment at enormous cost and provides an essential and supportive service to severely disabled and disadvantaged individuals who are not other wise able to obtain respite care for themselves and their carers.
